```
# cd /usr/ports/mail/procmail
# make config ; make install clean
# rehash
```

```
    # Environment Variables
    MAILDIR=$HOME/Maildir/
    DEFAULT=$HOME/Maildir/
    DROPPRIVS = yes
    LOGFILE=$HOME/proc.log
    # Spam to Junk Recipe
    :0
    *^X-Spam-Status: Yes
    .Junk/
    ```
